ygData.msgSnippet: A pale, dry, robotic voice come on over the comm. We are sorry, all of our staff are currently occupied, please come back again later. However, if you wish to

A pale, dry, robotic voice come on over the comm. "We are sorry, all of our
staff are currently occupied, please come back again later. However, if you
wish to leave a message, please press one... now. If you would like to wait
until one of our sales-persons are available to assist you, then please stay
on the line." The voice clicks off and Kenny G. starts playing.
